content: Create a room based on a template. All settings, folders and files will be taken from the selected room template.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a UI element that describes creating a room based on a template. It will appear in a settings or options section, likely as part of a button or dialog title. Translators should replace "Create a room" with a phrase that accurately reflects the specific context where this text appears.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'أنشئوا غرفة استنادًا إلى قالب' uses the plural imperative form (أنشئوا) which might be too formal or directive for a user interface instruction. A more suitable phrasing might use a singular imperative or a more suggestive form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more polite or suggestive phrasing like 'أنشئ غرفة بناءً على قالب' (Create a room based on a template) or 'يمكنكم إنشاء غرفة بناءً على قالب' (You can create a room based on a template).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'users' is missing. The original English sentence states that users are included in the copy from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Include 'المستخدمين' (users) in the translation. A possible revised translation: 'أنشئوا غرفة استنادًا إلى قالب. سيتم نقل جميع الإعدادات والمستخدمين والمجلدات والملفات من القالب المختار.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'users' is missing from the Azerbaijani translation. The English content explicitly mentions users will be taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şablon əsasında otaq yaradın. Bütün parametrlər, istifadəçilər, qovluqlar və fayllar seçilmiş otaq şablonundan idxal ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions 'users' but the Bulgarian translation omits them. The phrase 'All settings, users, folders and files' needs to be fully translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Създайте стая по шаблон. Всички настройки, потребители, папки и файлове ще бъдат взети от избрания шаблон за стая.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Czech translation. The original English content mentions users being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvoření místnosti podle šablony. Všechna nastavení, uživatelé, složky a soubory budou převzaty z vybrané šablony místnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions 'users' which is missing from the German translation. The translation only includes 'Einstellungen, Ordner und Dateien'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erstellen Sie einen Raum basierend auf einer Vorlage. Alle Einstellungen, Benutzer, Ordner und Dateien werden aus der ausgewählten Raumvorlage übernommen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'users' is missing from the Greek translation. The English content states 'All settings, users, folders and files...' while the Greek translation only includes settings, folders, and files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Δημιουργήστε μια αίθουσα με βάση ένα πρότυπο. Όλες οι ρυθμίσεις, οι χρήστες, οι φάκελοι και τα αρχεία θα ληφθούν από το επιλεγμένο πρότυπο δωματίου.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Spanish translation. The English text explicitly mentions users being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree una sala basada en una plantilla. Todos los ajustes, usuarios, carpetas y archivos se tomarán de la plantilla de sala seleccionada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is omitted from the Finnish translation. The English text explicitly mentions users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo huone mallin perusteella. Kaikki asetukset, käyttäjät, kansiot ja tiedostot otetaan valitusta huoneen mallista.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the French translation. The French translation only mentions 'paramètres, dossiers et fichiers', omitting the 'users' element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Créez une salle à partir d'un modèle. Tous les paramètres, utilisateurs, dossiers et fichiers seront repris du modèle de salle sélectionné.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions 'users' which is missing from the Italian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crea una stanza basata su un modello. Tutte le impostazioni, gli utenti, le cartelle e i file verranno presi dal modello di stanza selezionato.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'users' is missing from the Japanese translation. The English content explicitly mentions users being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: テンプレートに基づいてルームを作成します。すべての設定、フォルダー、ファイル、およびユーザーは、選択されたルームのテンプレートから取得されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "모든 설정, 폴더 및 파일은 선택된 룸 템플릿에서 가져오기됩니다." is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "선택된 룸 템플릿에서 모든 설정, 폴더 및 파일이 가져와집니다." or "선택된 룸 템플릿에서 설정, 폴더 및 파일을 가져옵니다."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 선택된 룸 템플릿에서 설정, 폴더 및 파일을 가져옵니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses the phrase "ໂຟນເດີ" which translates to 'folders'. The English content specifies 'users' are also taken from the template, which is missing in the Lao translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສ້າງຫ້ອງໂດຍອີງຕາມແມ່ແບບ. ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ, ຜູ້ໃຊ້, ໂຟນເດີ ແລະ ໄຟລ໌ທັງໝົດຈະຖືກເອົາຈາກແມ່ແບບຫ້ອງທີ່ເລືອກ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is not translated. The Latvian translation is missing the equivalent of 'users'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izveidojiet telpu, pamatojoties uz veidni. Visi iestatījumi, lietotāji, mapes un faili tiks pārņemti no izvēlētās telpas veidnes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Dutch translation. The original text refers to users being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maak een kamer op basis van een sjabloon. Alle instellingen, gebruikers, mappen en bestanden worden overgenomen van de geselecteerde kamer sjabloon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Polish translation. The original text refers to users being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utwórz pokój na podstawie szablonu. Wszystkie ustawienia, użytkownicy, katalogi i pliki zostaną wzięte z wybranego szablonu pokoju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Portuguese translation. It was omitted between 'definições' (settings) and 'pastas' (folders).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie uma sala com base num template. Todas as definições, utilizadores, pastas e ficheiros serão retirados do modelo de sala selecionado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is omitted from the Portuguese translation. The original English states that users will be taken from the template, which is missing in the Portuguese version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie uma sala com base em um modelo. Todas as configurações, usuários, pastas e arquivos serão retirados do modelo de sala selecionado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Romanian translation. The Romanian translation only mentions settings, folders and files, but not users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați o sală cu ajutorul șablonului. Toate setările, utilizatorii, folderele și fișierele vor fi preluate din șablonul de sală selectat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions 'users' being taken from the template, but this is missing from the Russian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Создайте комнату на основе шаблона. Все настройки, пользователи, папки и файлы будут взяты из выбранного шаблона комнаты.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "taken from" is not the most natural translation for "will be taken from". A better phrasing would capture the idea of inheritance or copying.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අච්චුවක් මත පදනම්ව කාමරයක් සාදන්න. සියලුම සැකසුම්, ෆෝල්ඩර සහ ගොනු තෝරාගත් කාමර අච්චුවෙන් ලබාගත/පනවානු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'ෆෝල්ඩර සහ ගොනු' could be more elegantly phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ෆෝල්ඩර හා ගොනු

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Slovak translation. The Slovak translation only mentions settings, folders, and files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvorenie miestnosti na základe šablóny. Všetky nastavenia, používatelia, priečinky a súbory budú prevzaté z vybranej šablóny miestnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'users' is missing from the Slovenian translation. The English content explicitly mentions 'users', which is a significant part of the room setup.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarite sobo na podlagi predloge. Vse nastavitve, uporabniki, mape in datoteke bodo prevzete iz izbrane predloge sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Serbian translation. It was implied within the overall context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Креирајте собу на основу шаблона. Сви подешавања, корисници, фолдери и фајлови биће преузети из одабраног шаблона собе

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'users' is missing from the Serbian translation. The English text explicitly states that users are included in the template transfer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreirajte sobu na osnovu šablona. Svi podešavanja, korisnici, folderi i fajlovi biće preuzeti iz odabranog šablona sobe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Turkish translation. The original English content mentions 'users' as being taken from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir şablona göre oda oluşturun. Tüm ayarlar, kullanıcılar, klasörler ve dosyalar seçilen oda şablonundan alınacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Усі параметри, папки та файли будуть взяті з обраного шаблону кімнати.' is a bit literal. While technically correct, it could be more natural in Ukrainian. 'Параметри' sounds slightly formal in this context. It also repeats 'кімнати' unnecessarily. A more natural phrasing might use a more general term for 'settings' and avoid repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Створіть кімнату на основі шаблону. Усі налаштування, папки та файли будуть взяті з обраного шаблону.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'users' is missing from the Vietnamese translation. The English content mentions users, and this should be reflected in the Vietnamese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tạo phòng dựa trên biểu mẫu. Tất cả các cài đặt, người dùng, thư mục và tập tin sẽ được lấy từ mẫu phòng đã chọn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '将套用房间模板中的所有设置、文件夹和文件' is a bit awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'All settings, users, folders and files will be taken from the selected room template.'. It implies applying the template rather than inheriting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用选定的房间模板，所有设置、用户、文件夹和文件将被继承。
